issue.title: RFC: Organize language implementations in a top-level lib/ directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2187](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2187). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As we acquire more Arrow implementations, the number of top-level directories may grow significantly. We might consider nesting these implementations under a new top-level directory, similar to Apache Thrift: https://github.com/apache/thrift (see the "lib/" directory)
